    • Method Detail

      • list

        public void list()
        Description copied from class: Command
        Base method for listings. May be used as general listing or as helper to another specialized type of listing. Subclasses must implement it to the cases where some invalid action is called ( which means that the exception will be caught and the general listing will be used )
        Specified by:
        list in class Command
        See Also:
        Command.list()
